text:
August 5, 1959
Dr. Marshall McLuhan
Department of Extension
University of British Columbia
Vancouver, British, Columbia, Canada
Dear Marshall:
Will be back here night of August 22* Staying at Cabin #5, Bassett Point
Resent, Tomahawk, Wisconsin, August 8 - 22, for ray "vacation.‚Äù Even
then have to make trips to Minneapolis and Madison * But not staving In
Madison. Expect to be there only one day: August 20, for meeting.
Can be reached through Harley or McCarty that day.
Regards,
hjs:rs
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
